channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 14th November
item.description:
There is fly tipping by the recycling Centre by Erith Road junction with Upper park road.

item.title: Mattress, wood planks and other rubbish left, 14th November
item.description:
Since last night (13th Nov) a mattress, pieces of wood and other rubbish has been left on the public footpath. Next to this on the double yellow line a van also appears to have been abandoned causing a hazard to drivers.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Archery Road, Eltham

item.title: Overhanging willow tree, 14th November
item.description:

item.title: Surface water flood zone, 14th November
item.description:
I myself swept leaves away this morning to reveal only one drain in greenfield road ( there maybe more ?) because we are expecting storm Claudia over the uk with heavy and continuous rain . This area is a flood zone making houses uninsurable. With leaves blocking ( one) drain I must insist that the leaves are swept on a much more regular basis to reveal drains â€¦..and Thames water do some work putting in more drains .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 49, Greenfield Road, West Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet
